body.value:
{
    "name": "@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
    "status": "@{activity('Archive Files').output.executionDetails[0].status}",
    "datafactory": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "runid": "@{pipeline().RunId}",
    "error": "@{if(empty(activity('Archive Files').output.errors), 'No errors found in Archive Files activity', activity('Archive Files').output.errors[0])}"
}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT WatermarkValue
FROM dbo.incremental_load
WHERE TableName = 'raw/online'

value.value: @addSeconds(activity('Copy from DataLake to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].start,activity('Copy from DataLake to Staging').output.executionDetails[0].duration)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select MAX(TransactionDt) As NewWatermarkValue
from dbo.tickets

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from dbo.Tickets where TransactionDt > '@{activity('LookupOldWatermark').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and TransactionDt <= '@{activity('LookupNewWatermark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'
